= Image placing =
With the image placing options you can select which image types are shown in which image controls. Note that not all RCB skins fully support image placing. Atm only the default Confluence skin has full image placing support.

You can define your own image placing options or edit the existing ones if they don't fit your needs. Check [CustomizePresentationOfArtwork this page] for more information.

By default there will be 6 different image placing options:

== gameinfobig ==
[http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfobig.jpg http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfobig_preview.jpg]

Displays one big image (usually in game screenshot) in the game details.

== gameinfobigVideo ==
[http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfobigVideo.jpg http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfobigVideo_preview.jpg]

Automatically starts video playback if video is available for selected game.

== gameinfosmall ==
[http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfosmall.jpg http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfosmall_preview.jpg]

Displays four small images (e.g. in game screenshot, box front, box back, cartridge)

== gameinfosmallVideo ==
[http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfosmallVideo.jpg http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_Info_gameinfosmallVideo_preview.jpg]

Displays three small images and automatically starts video playback if video is available for selected game.

== gameinfomamemarquee ==
[http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_info_reworked_MAME_marquee.jpg http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_info_reworked_MAME_marquee%20-%20preview.jpg]

MAME specific: Displays marquee images in the game list and cabinet, action and title in the additional controls.

== gameinfomamecabinet ==
[http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_info_reworked_MAME_cabinet.jpg http://romcollectionbrowser.googlecode.com/files/screen_info_reworked_MAME_cabinet%20-%20preview.jpg]

MAME specific: Displays cabinet images in the game list and marquee, action and title in the additional controls.
